title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 359.0 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 359.0 - Scope

State Regulations

This Part prescribes the processes and procedures that
must be followed when a public assistance recipient is accused of intentionally
violating the requirements of the public assistance programs in a fraudulent
manner or a food stamp recipient is accused of intentionally violating the
requirements of the food stamp program in a fraudulent manner. If such a
recipient is found to have committed an intentional program violation, the
recipient may be disqualified from participation in such program for the
periods of time set forth in this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
359.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
